author: Xbox
description:

author: Xbox
description:
Play Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 now with Xbox Game Pass on console, PC, and cloud. 

Soar into new worlds with Game Pass. Be the first to play new games on day one. Download and explore a library with everything from the biggest blockbusters to critically acclaimed indie games, like Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4,Crash Bandicoot™ 4: It’s About Time, Lost in Random: The Eternal Die, REMATCH, and many more. Become a Game Pass member for one low monthly price and join the adventure across console, PC, and cloud. With new games added all the time, there’s always something to explore.

Join Game Pass today at https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

*Some content shown is not actual gameplay. Game catalog and features vary by plan, by region and over time. https://xbox.com/gamepass

author: Xbox
description:
FAIRY TAIL 100 Year Quest collaboration!

In the Mysterious Organization quest story, in addition to Natsu, Lucy, and Happy, original characters Submerse and Maruha, drawn by Hiro Mashima, also appear!

Veteran Adventurer Maruha wants you to do a background check on a "criminal that shouldn't exist". Perhaps that's not all...

Take off to the stars, and adventure!

EDENS ZERO the game, release on July 15, 2025

A 3D Action RPG based on the space fantasy manga/anime “EDENS ZERO” by Hiro Mashima (creator of FAIRY TAIL and Rave Master)

Use the unique characters and embark on an epic adventure through various fields while engaging in fierce battles with powerful enemy characters!

Pre-order now!

Xbox Series X|S and Windows
https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9P2R10RPFR28

©Hiro Mashima, Atsuo Ueda, KODANSHA / FAIRY TAIL 100 YEARS QUEST Committee, TV TOKYO
©Hiro Mashima / Kodansha, NTV
©Konami Digital Entertainment
